extraComponents.title: Frequent Questions
items: Does this work with free AI versions? Yes, all prompts are optimized for both free and paid models.
Are updates included? Absolutely, you get all future prompt expansions at no extra cost.
Can I use this for client work? Yes, a full commercial license is bundled with your purchase.
